simplified: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲

pronunciation.pinyin: shào zhuàng bù nǚ lì , lǎo dà tú shāng bēi
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1

details.simplified: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲
details.traditional: 少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲

meanings.value: if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age
